response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product holds significant value for us at $1,500,000, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. However, I am extending a special offer to you, recognizing your discerning taste and the potential synergy between our offerings.

For a limited time, I am willing to offer this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving of $300,000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself.

Please consider this offer carefully. I am confident that you will find the product to be a valuable addition to your collection or business. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
